title: Worktrees skill (task isolation)
description: Create a skill for git worktree-based task isolation. Each task runs in a clean worktree, preventing cross-contamination. Integrates with Linear skill to create worktrees from issue IDs. Based on CTO's Linear worktree workflow pattern.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Create SKILL.md router (~50 lines) with workflow references
Create workflows/create.md for creating new worktree from branch/issue
Create workflows/list.md for listing active worktrees
Create workflows/switch.md for switching between worktrees
Create workflows/cleanup.md for removing completed worktrees
Create workflows/from-linear.md to create worktree from Linear issue ID
Auto-name branch from Linear issue (e.g., feature/LIN-123-description)
